method: Preheat the circular saw to medium heat.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the rainbow sprinkles, unicorn tears, rainbow bacon strips, unicorn flour, and fairy dust.
Using the circular saw, carefully cut the mixture into circular shapes.
Place the circular mixture on a baking tray and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
Serve the circular saw special with your favorite dipping sauce.
